title: 玩了蛮久的一个懒人包，突然系统报错QAQ，错误日志如下
author: futuzi_ariel
txt_content:
--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 63475ee3 --------
Generated 12-10-7 下午3:11
Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows 7 (amd64) version 6.1
Java: 1.6.0_20, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5450  version 3.2.9236, ATI Technologies Inc.
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2645
 at pb.getFlammability(Block.java:1283)
 at pb.isFlammable(Block.java:1300)
 at ame.canBlockCatchFire(BlockFire.java:455)
 at vl.f(RenderBlocks.java:1456)
 at vl.b(RenderBlocks.java:387)
 at ct.a(WorldRenderer.java:211)
 at l.a(RenderGlobal.java:1482)
 at lr.a(EntityRenderer.java:1070)
 at lr.b(EntityRenderer.java:907)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.x(Minecraft.java:873)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:750)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT c129fa7c ----------

这是肿么了呀。。。跪求帮助。。。建了好久的房子了，真心不能弃呀。

replies.author: 大法克
replies.txt_content: 崩溃= =重新解压就可以了，舍不得房子的话就把存档拿出来换个启动器继续玩～

replies.author: 大法克
哇哈哈你是猪
replies.txt_content: 敢问是因为你怎让了之后崩溃的

replies.author: futuzi_ariel
replies.txt_content:
哇哈哈你是猪 发表于 2012-10-7 18:29 
敢问是因为你怎让了之后崩溃的
我什么也没做呀。。就是挖着挖着地突然就弹出来了QAQ

replies.txt_content:

崩溃= =重新解压就可以了，舍不得房子的话就把存档拿出来换个启动器继续玩～
